content: the seeded rib stitch cowl uses two skeins of franca and knits them in a simple stitch to create a plush and cozy cowl the oversized cowl wards off the last of winter s chill - perfect for the crisp mornings and frosty evenings as we look to that spring weather coming in ---- size 22 circumference 14 tall unblocked note cowl will stretch wider when worn materials manos del uruguay franca 100% superwash merino approx 150g/114 yds 2 skeins shown in f9053 gold nugget us11 / 8mm 24 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 22 stitches in seeded rib stitch = 4
